column5: A 2,850 square foot home great for family and friends. 5 minutes from Six Flags Over Texas, 15 minutes from SeaWorld and just 20 minutes from Downtown. Come stay for a few days or a few weeks, you'll enjoy your time here. Less expensive than a hotel room and lots of space to relax and enjoy your vacation!
column8: 2,850 square foot home, 5 minutes from Six Flags!
